about_the_game:
• This is the story of a pig, who lived happily on his farm, food, mud and sleep were never lacking, until one day something changed.
  • So this pig decided that he did not want to be one more, that he did not want his life to be just food for others.
  • This Pig decides to take the law into his own hands to free himself from his oppression and his peers.



This is the scoop on PIGNATOR, an action-packed First Person game, with a visual style that places us before a game that is inspired by the aesthetics and gameplay of old FPS games.



  • Visual style of CRT Monitors
  • Pixel Art Graphics with 3D Environments
  • Hard Mode for more Hardcore players
  • Keyboard and mouse controls
  • Controller Compatibility
  • Wide screen resolution support
  • Native 60 FPS support
  • Multiplayer and local PVP
  • Horde mode
detailed_description:
• This is the story of a pig, who lived happily on his farm, food, mud and sleep were never lacking, until one day something changed.
  • So this pig decided that he did not want to be one more, that he did not want his life to be just food for others.
  • This Pig decides to take the law into his own hands to free himself from his oppression and his peers.



This is the scoop on PIGNATOR, an action-packed First Person game, with a visual style that places us before a game that is inspired by the aesthetics and gameplay of old FPS games.



  • Visual style of CRT Monitors
  • Pixel Art Graphics with 3D Environments
  • Hard Mode for more Hardcore players
  • Keyboard and mouse controls
  • Controller Compatibility
  • Wide screen resolution support
  • Native 60 FPS support
  • Multiplayer and local PVP
  • Horde mode

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2.50GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: PIGNATOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: AN ACTION-PACKED ADVENTURE IN SEARCH OF THE FREEDOM AND REVENGE OF A PIG - This Game is a crazy FPS that will not give you rest, kill your enemies without mercy because they will not have it with you
